---
title: "Wild Cluster Bootstrap Inference in Stata, Julia and Python"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

Fast wild cluster bootstrap algorithms as in `fwildclusterboot` are further implemented in Stata, Julia and Python: 

+ Stata: [boottest](https://github.com/droodman/boottest) 
+ Julia: [WildBootTests.jl](https://github.com/droodman/WildBootTests.jl) 
+ Python: [wildboottest](https://github.com/s3alfisc/wildboottest)
